column13: Pavers England Slip On Price: Rs.2244

column1: Corporate elegance meets sophistication in this stylish pair of slingback heels from Pavers England which is the right choice to complement your formal attire. These black formal heels are enhanced with elastic ankle straps to ensure snug fit and perfect grip when walking. Team these heels with a ruffled blouse and pleated skirt.
